detectors.description:
Pausable.whenNotPaused() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PhantasmaToken.sol#39-42) uses a Boolean constant improperly:
	-require(bool,string)(! _paused,Pausable: paused) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PhantasmaToken.sol#40)

PhantasmaToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PhantasmaToken.sol#297-312) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _balances[_to] = _balances[_to].add(_value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PhantasmaToken.sol#303)
detectors.markdown:
[PhantasmaToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PhantasmaToken.sol#L297-L312) can write the state variable array at will
